note.p: Birth: Berkswell, near Coventry, Warwickshire (24 July 1881)
Death: 8 Hurst Lane, London NW11 (30 January 1976)
Education: Mason's College, Birmingham; BA (1903) St John's College, Cambridge; MA
Career: Served in the Great War (1915-1919); Assistant Director, Meteorological Office, Air Ministry (1919-)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1977 vol 23 pp 115-131, plate, by R C Sutcliffe and A C Best
